column4: And what might be a problem if I make a direct 1000mbit ethernet link between 2 ubuntu boxes, set up jumbo-frame (mtu 6000) and there is no speed up? Tried both small and large files, nfs and smb shares, etc.
mtu should be 1492, if higher, ethernet becomes unstable or unusable (1492 = 1500-8)
then what all that mess with jumbo-frames up to mtu=9000 is about?
